item.title: General
item.description: Bash remove empty lines insert/replace directly in file remove empty lines sed '/^[[:space:]]*$/d' FILE insert/replace directly in file sed -i '/^[[:space:]]*$/d' FILE test port connection $> nc -vz 10.244.1.4 3306 Connection to 10.244.1.4 3306 port [tcp/mysql] succeeded!
